item.description:
Hello Boston Townhall Members,

Tuesday, February 6 we will be at Bertucci's restaurant in Newton, Massachusetts. It is actually technically on 275 Centre St, but this portion of Centre Street also is quickly renamed as Galen Street.

it is easily accessible from the Mass. Pike exit 17, if you are going west from Boston, and make your way up the exit ramp Bertucci's restaurant is directly on the right half a block, with parking on your left at Pearl Street.

Sincerely,

Randy Bock, (new) Organizer
Boston Townhall Meetup
item.name: The Boston Townhall February Meetup
